description: The underlying cause of CVE-2024-30101 is a use after free condition in Microsoft Office, where a program continues to access memory after it has been freed, leading to remote code execution vulnerabilities. This flaw can be exploited when a user opens a specially crafted email in Microsoft Outlook, potentially allowing attackers to execute arbitrary code with the same privileges as the user. The issue impacts multiple Microsoft Office products and build versions, specifically noted under CWE-416.
